sec.title: Identification of instruction handbook
sec.p: Each instruction handbook shall be easily identified by:

list-item.label: a)
list-item.p: manufacturer or brand name and logo;

list-item.label: b)
list-item.p: type designation, model name of the rig;

list-item.label: c)
list-item.p: serial number of the rig, if applicable;

list-item.label: d)
list-item.p: type of instruction (see 6.5.2), to be mentioned in the title of the instruction;
